faqs.question: Is South City 1 considered a safe and secure place for families to reside
faqs.answer: Yes absolutely South City 1 is highly regarded for its safety and robust security infrastructure. faqs.question: Are the properties in South City 1 freehold or leasehold status
faqs.answer: A vast majority of the residential properties houses and plots in South City 1 are freehold properties. faqs.question: What documents should I verify before I buy a house in South City 1
faqs.answer: Thorough due diligence is crucial. Key documents to verify include the registered sale deed of the land the occupancy certificate OC the building plans approved by the relevant authority and the mutation records showing ownership transfer. Additionally ensure all property tax receipts and utility bills are up to date and check for any outstanding mortgages or legal disputes associated with the specific house. Our legal team assists clients in verifying every single required document.
